Name: Lane Shrub: Standard â…¡
Desc: Commonly seen in the Court of Fontaine, it is adorned with vibrant yellow flowers and listed in the Court of Fontaine Standards for Urban Decorative Plants as the second kind of classic example. Initially, this yellow-blossomed shrub was believed to be closely related to certain plants in Mondstadt. This led some Sumeru Amurta scholars visiting Fontaine to hypothesize that it spread to Mondstadt and take samples for research. They later discovered that the shrub, like the Rainbow Rose, has multiple colors, the yellow variety having been specifically bred in Fontaine. The scholars' tremendous research efforts thus all came to nothing...
